scripts.build-site: cd "../TechnoJaw" && npm run build && rm -rf "../TechnoJaw App/dist" && cp -R dist "../TechnoJaw App/dist"
scripts.dist: npm run build-site && node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=p.version.split('.');v[2]=+v[2]+1;if(+v[2]>=10){v[1]=+v[1]+1;v[2]=0;}p.version=v.join('.');require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');console.log('v'+p.version)" && electron-builder --mac && npm run install-app
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build-site && node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=p.version.split('.');v[2]=+v[2]+1;if(+v[2]>=10){v[1]=+v[1]+1;v[2]=0;}p.version=v.join('.');require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');console.log('v'+p.version)" && electron-builder --mac && npm run install-app
scripts.dist:win: npm run build-site && electron-builder --win && npm run copy-win
scripts.install-app: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && APP=$(ls -d release/mac-arm64/*.app 2>/dev/null || ls -d release/mac/*.app 2>/dev/null) && rm -rf ~/Desktop/TechnoJaw.app && ditto "$APP" ~/Desktop/TechnoJaw.app && codesign --force --deep --sign - ~/Desktop/TechnoJaw.app 2>/dev/null; xattr -cr ~/Desktop/TechnoJaw.app; mkdir -p ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw && rm -f ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw/*.dmg ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw/*.exe && for f in release/TechnoJaw-*-arm64.dmg; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw/TechnoJaw_${VER}_arm64.dmg 2>/dev/null; done; for f in release/TechnoJaw-*.dmg; do echo "$f" | grep -q arm64 || cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw/TechnoJaw_${VER}_x64.dmg 2>/dev/null; done; rm -rf release/mac-arm64 release/mac; killall Dock 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.copy-win: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && mkdir -p ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw && rm -f ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw/*.exe && for f in release/"TechnoJaw Setup"*.exe; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/TechnoJaw/TechnoJaw_${VER}.exe 2>/dev/null; done; true
scripts.release: npm run build-site && node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=p.version.split('.');v[2]=+v[2]+1;if(+v[2]>=10){v[1]=+v[1]+1;v[2]=0;}p.version=v.join('.');require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');console.log('v'+p.version)" && electron-builder --mac --publish always && npm run install-app
